annotations.description: There's really not a lot of information on the Army & Navy other than that it was first published in David A. Embry's How To Mix Drinks published in 1948 and...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Army & Navy

textContent:
2oz or 60ml Gin
.75oz or 20ml Lemon Juice
.75oz or 20ml Orgeat
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters

Shake and strain
Garnish with lemon twist or angostura or nothing

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5pwhODJHMRM
title: Army & Navy
